segments.text: I'm going to the store downtown this afternoon to try on my wedding dresses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you come with me and help me choose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I will . How can I miss that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I think I'll get too nervous to look at myself in the mirror !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don't . I'm sure you'll be the loveliest bride ever !
segments.speaker: S2
